metadata.title: CVE-2023-4504 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted PPDPostScript document, CUPS and libppd are susceptible to a heap-based bufferoverflow and possibly code execution. This issue has been fixed in CUPSversion 2.4.7, released in September of 2023.

criterions.comment: cups: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libppd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
